translations: n.插入，嵌入；（书、文章等中）添加的东西；（服装面料的）布饰，绣饰；（报刊的）插登广告；（器官的）附着

sentences.sentence: An examination is carried out before the insertion of the tube.
sentences.translation: 插入导管前先要进行检查。

sentences.sentence: If you add a word, put an insertion mark in the right place and write the missing word in the blank.
sentences.translation: 如果你要添加一个单词，在正确的位置做一个插入标记，然后把缺失的单词写在空白处。

sentences.sentence: The power supply connector can realize safe electriferous insertion in the power transmission of a power interface.
sentences.translation: 在电源接口的功率传输中，电源接头可以实现安全带电插接。
